review_data.title: Not your regular Japanse sushi restaurant

review_data.title: The place to try Japanese curry
review_data.content: A perfect choice for a healthy, super quickly served Japanese lunch. Their midday menu offers the usual boxes and sushi dishes but their Japanese curry is definitely worth a try with different toppings, the duck being a really superb option.

review_data.title: Tasty, fresh, authentic - love it!

review_data.title: Amazing
